name: The Hotdog That Makes You Scream When You Eat It
name_original: The Hotdog That Makes You Scream When You Eat It
description:
In January of 2023, I posted the following tweet:

stephen king short story introductions are always like “one morning I awoke with an extremely clear vision in my head: a hot dog that makes you scream when you eat it. this image was so disturbing—so *terrifying*—that I immediately started writing a story around it”
— Taylor Swope (@_taylorswope) January 29, 2023

This idea was so interesting—so *engaging*—that I immediately started developing a game around it.

The interactive experience found here is not one I can take credit for; it existed, fully formed, in some ethereal realm of terror and processed meats, and I was merely a conduit—a sort of midwife— to bring it into our world.

  • Mix and match 5 exciting hotdog toppings
  • Experience over a dozen unique scream sounds
  • Seek out and consume The Ultimate Hotdog

Estimated play time: 10-30 minutes

Controls: 

  • WASD or Right Mouse Button to Move
  • Mouse to Look
  • Left Mouse Button to Interact
